short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily manage your receipts and spending online - with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ReceiptsPlus is the ultimate lightweight receipt and spending management tool. 

Log spending, organize your receipts, and make tax time a breeze. 

With our extension, now you can effortlessly manage your receipts and spending seamlessly across the web.

Capture receipts in a single click from any web page or collect them using your dedicated @receipts.plus email address.

    * Upload receipts- your way. Wherever you shop online, capture receipts in single click.
    * Synchronize spending: Easily track your online spending along with the rest of your expenses using a free ReceiptsPlus account.
    * Reports: Use automation to easily generate reports and organize your receipts at tax time.


Join over 10,000 ReceiptsPlus users today!

A free ReceiptsPlus account (https://www.receipts.plus) is required to use this extension.
